title: Curried Coconut and Peanut Soup
ingredients: ['30g butter', '3 sticks celery, finely chopped', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1/4 teaspoon chilli pepper or crushed chillies to taste', '800ml chicken stock', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '260g creamy peanut butter', '75g peanuts, chopped']
